table.searchString: | inputlookup dmc_assets | rename serverName AS splunk_server | where (match(search_group, "dmc_group_")) | `dmc_set_group_label_and_sort(search_group)` | stats values(label) AS roles by splunk_server | makemv roles | join type=outer splunk_server [rest splunk_server=* /services/server/info | fields splunk_server, os_name, os_version] | eval OS = 'os_name'." ".'os_version' | join type=outer splunk_server [rest splunk_server=* /services/workloads/status/workload-management-status | fields splunk_server, general.isSupported, general.enabled, general.error_message] | eval Status = case('general.isSupported' = 0 OR isnull('general.isSupported'), "Unsupported", 'general.isSupported' = 1, "Supported")." / ".case('general.enabled' = 0, "Disabled", 'general.enabled' = 1, "Enabled", isnull('general.enabled'), "N/A") | fields splunk_server, roles, OS, Status, general.error_message | rename splunk_server AS "Instance", roles AS Roles, general.error_message AS "Error Messages"

| inputlookup dmc_assets | rename serverName AS splunk_server | where (match(search_group, "dmc_group_")) | `dmc_set_group_label_and_sort(search_group)` | stats values(label) AS roles by splunk_server | makemv roles | join type=outer splunk_server [rest splunk_server=* /services/workloads/pools | eval default_pool=if(category=="search" and default_category_pool=="1",(if(isNull('title'), "Not Configured", 'title')),NULL) | eval ingest_pool=if(category=="ingest" and default_category_pool=="1",(if(isNull('title'), "Not Configured", 'title')),NULL) | stats values(eval(if(title!="general",title,NULL))) as pools values(default_pool) AS default_pool values(ingest_pool) AS ingest_pool by splunk_server] | fields splunk_server, roles, default_pool, ingest_pool, pools | rename splunk_server AS "Instance", roles AS Roles, default_pool AS "Default Search Pool", ingest_pool AS "Default Ingest Pool" pools AS "All Pools"

panel.title: Deployment-Wide $CPUFunctionLabel$ CPU Usage by Workload Pool

search.query: `dmc_set_index_introspection` search_group="$role$" sourcetype=splunk_resource_usage component=PerProcess | `dmc_rename_introspection_fields` | `dmc_set_bin` | stats sum(pct_cpu) as pct_cpu by host, workload_pool, _time | `dmc_timechart` $CPUFunction$(pct_cpu) as pct_cpu by workload_pool

panel.title: Deployment-Wide $MemFuncLabel$ Physical Memory Usage by Workload Pool

search.query: `dmc_set_index_introspection` search_group="$role$" sourcetype=splunk_resource_usage component=PerProcess | `dmc_rename_introspection_fields` | `dmc_set_bin` | stats sum(mem_used) as mem_used by host, workload_pool _time | `dmc_timechart` $MemFunc$(mem_used) as mem_used by workload_pool
